begin: ^By the time you read this diary, I'll probably be dead.
^I'm guessing you are also a traveler from Earth, how was your interstellar trip?

s: ^What a strange diary on this abandoned ship

q1a2: ^I must have found some interesting story, the ship looks to have been abandoned for many years.
choice2: ^Let me introduce myself, I am the captain of the ship "Forward". This is an advanced interstellar exploration ship. It has a maximum forward speed of 50% of the speed of light and can carry a maximum crew of 256.
choice3: ^But the ship's original mission was to explore a galaxy 30 light-years from Earth, where scientists reported that one of the planets was potentially highly habitable, yet when Forward and I arrived here, everything changed.

s: ^I've heard of this mission, but that planet has been identified as a barren planet

choice4: ^Something terrible happened, the mission was terminated, Forward was in mortal danger, we could not go back, so we had to find another way out

s: ^Something very dangerous... Happened? What happened to Forward? What about the crew?

choice5: ^At the time of writing this diary, THEY have come, THEY are unstoppable, the crew has gone crazy, and I am about to lose my mind. If you read this afterwards, please make sure you tell others to stay away from here! LEAVE!
